nodes.text: AR-312 was a scan the University of Agamar science team made of a cave on Bimmiel. It detailed the mummified remains of a humanoid which had been in the cave for about fifty years. The humanoid had been defending against slashrats, and had fallen back to the cave. It had taken out at least two slashrats before dying, and had weapons and armor nearby.

When Doctor Pace showed Corran Horn the scan, he recognized the features as belonging to a Yuuzhan Vong. The remains would later be involved in Horn's duel against Shedao Shai, and the devastation of Ithor.
